definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Subsequent excision and drainage were performed after antibiotic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 抗生素治療後進行切除和引流治療。

sentences.english: The patient underwent external decompression and external ventricular drainage.
sentences.chinese: 患者接受了外部減壓和腦室外引流。

sentences.english: Objective To explore effects of pleural space drainage plus drug infusion in treating tuberculous empyema.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胸腔閉式引流法治療結核性膿胸的效果。

sentences.english: Today, there is also shipped a lot of drainage pipe and seamless pipe on site.
sentences.chinese: 今天，也有很多引流管和無縫管網站發貨。

sentences.english: Objective To appraise the clinic effect of mini-invasive drainage on hemorrhages cerebral apoplexy with herniation.
sentences.chinese: 探討微創穿刺引流對出血性腦卒中並腦疝的治療價值。

sentences.english: Bowel or omentum may herniate alongside the drain .
sentences.chinese: 腸管或網膜可能沿引流物疝出。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a drainage bag with a built-in pipe and two openings.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型公開了一種內置管雙出口引流袋。

sentences.english: Today I'll drill a little hole in the tooth for pus-drainage to stop the pain.
sentences.chinese: 今天先在牙上鑽個小洞將膿引流出來，這樣可以止痛。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the experiences of simultaneous kidney-pancreas transplantation (SKPT) with enteric drainage of pancreatic secretion (ED).
sentences.chinese: 目的總結腸腔引流式胰腎聯合移植圍手術期處理經驗。

sentences.english: The drain should be soft and pliable .
sentences.chinese: 引流物應是軟而易彎的。

sentences.english: A special bag was connected to the tube for collecting bile.
sentences.chinese: 膽總管內置引流管引至大鼠頸背部，外接引流袋。

sentences.english: A special bag was connected to the tube for collecting bile.
sentences.chinese: 膽總管內置引流管引至大鼠頸背部，外接引流袋。

sentences.english: In lung abscess, percutaneous drainage can result in pleural seeding and possibly empyema.
sentences.chinese: 在肺膿瘍，經皮引流可導致肋膜轉移，並可能膿胸。

sentences.english: Methods The pelvis pressure was reduced through urine drainage from catheter under cystoscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法通過膀胱鏡輸尿管插管引流尿液使腎盂壓力降低。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the curative effect of contradrainage and thread drawing method to treat high anal horseshoe fistula (HAHS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討對口引流掛線在治療高位馬蹄瘻的效果。

sentences.english: Results PTBD was successfully performed in all the patients.
sentences.chinese: 結果全部病人經皮經肝穿刺膽道引流手術成功。

definition: talk (loanword)/chatline of PRC Internet company Taobao, taokshop.com
viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]
e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
incision/notch/slit/gash/margin of a page/trimmed edge (of a page in a book)
slang/argot/private language used as secret code
